description: This file defines a configuration helper class for loading environment variables, specifically handling the OpenAI API key within a Flutter project. It provides static methods to retrieve and verify the presence of the API key, ensuring secure access.

classes.name: Config
classes.description: A helper class that provides static accessors to environment variables, primarily for retrieving the OpenAI API key and checking its availability.

methods.name: openaiApiKey
methods.description: Retrieves the OpenAI API key from environment variables; may return null if not set.

methods.name: hasOpenAIApiKey
methods.description: Returns true if a non-empty API key is set; otherwise, false.
